sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for May 11 - 12

event: Mayfest Arts Fair at Gratz Park from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m.  See street closures below.
Run The Bluegrass at the Talon Winery from 7 a.m. to 1 p.m.  See street closures below.
StreetFest 2024 on Oliver Lewis Way from 10 a.m. to 12 p.m.  See street closures below.
Kiddie Kapers and Dance Attack Spring Recital at the Lexington Opera House at 12 p.m., 3:30 p.m. and 7 p.m.
Mayfest Arts Fair at Gratz Park from 11 a.m. to 5 p.m.  See street closures below.

day: Mayfest Arts Fair - Scheduled Street Closures:
event: Streets closed from 5 p.m. Friday 5/10 thru 7 p.m. Sunday 5/12.

day: Mayfest Arts Fair - Scheduled Street Closures:
event: W Third St between Broadway and Upper St.

day: Mayfest Arts Fair - Scheduled Street Closures:
event: N Mill St and Market St between W Second and W Third St.

day: Run The Bluegrass - Scheduled Street Closures:
event: Sections of Tates Creek Rd, Delong Rd, Shelby Ln, Jacks Creek Pike, and Spears Ln will be closed and gradually reopened as participants clear the roadways.
Oliver Lewis Way will be closed between W High St and S Broadway from 7:30 a.m. until noon on Saturday 5/11.
Events may be canceled due to weather or other unforeseen factors.
Please check with the proper venue for updated information.
